title: Sorina & Thomas' Wedding
Sorina & Thomas' Wedding
text:
Sorina Nagra
Daughter of Sohan Singh and Jaswinder Kaur; and Granddaughter of Gurdial Singh Nagra and Harbhajan Kaur Nagra.
&
Thomas Wood
Son of Steven Wood and Dianne Wood; Grandson of Bill Fasullo and Beverly Fasullo; and James Wood and Margaret Wood
Cordially invite you to join us in celebrating their wedding.

We look forward to celebrating this joyous occasion with you.
What should you expect at a Sikh wedding?

title: What To Expect At a Sikh Wedding
text:
Here are a few things to keep in mind if you haven’t attended a Sikh Wedding.



For the Ceremony at the Gurdwara:

Men: Traditional attire such as kurta-pajama or a suit. A head covering (like a handkerchief or turban) is required inside the Gurdwara.
Women: Traditional attire such as a salwar-kameez, saree, modest dress or a suit with pants. A head covering (like a scarf or dupatta) is required inside the Gurdwara.
Note: Shoes must be removed before entering the Gurdwara.

For the Reception:

Men: Traditional Indian attire or formal Western attire.
Women: Traditional Indian attire such as a lehenga, saree, or evening gown.






Milni (Introduction of Families):

This is a pre-wedding ritual where the families of the bride and groom meet and exchange garlands.
It is a warm and welcoming ceremony that signifies the union of two families.

Langar (Community Meal):

Before the ceremony, a vegetarian meal will be served.
Langar is a symbol of equality and community, so everyone sits together on the floor to eat.

Anand Karaj (Wedding Ceremony):

This is the main wedding ceremony held at the Gurdwara (Sikh temple).
The ceremony involves singing of hymns, reading from the Guru Granth Sahib (Sikh holy book), and the couple walking around the holy book four times.
Please note that attendees will be seated on the floor during the ceremony, as this is a traditional practice in the Gurdwara. There will be some stools available for anyone who may find it difficult to sit on the floor. If you believe you will need a stool, please indicate so on the RSVP or contact the bride or groom.

Reception:

The reception will follow the Anand Karaj, featuring music, dance, and a celebratory meal.

title: Messages to the Bride and Groom
text:
Lucia 2024-05-20


WOOHOO! Congratulations!! 😊️❤️❤️ wishing you both a long and happy and prosperous and healthy life together 🥺🥺🥺😭😭😭😭😭💓💓💓💓💓




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


Thank you Lucia, we are so happy and looking forward to a long and happy life together.




Sue 2024-05-20


How wonderful!




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


♥




Megan 2024-05-20


I’m so happy for you both. Congratulations!




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


Thank you for celebrating this special moment with us!




Candice 2024-05-20


Congratulations 🥺




Victoria 2024-05-20


Congratulations!




Brenda 2024-05-20


Congratulations!!




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


We appreciate your love and blessings.




Rachel 2024-05-20


Beautiful love!!  




Papa 2024-05-20


Lovely thanks for sharing grandma and papa 🙏🙏




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


Thank you, Grandma and Papa




Elizabeth 2024-05-20


Congratulations &
Best Wishes 🌹




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


Thank you!




Marie 2024-05-20


Congratulations to the beautiful couple! 💕🥂




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


💕




Gillian 2024-05-20


I’m so happy for you both




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


Hi Gillian, we’re really looking forward to seeing you at the wedding! 🥳




Nina 2024-05-20


I wish I could attend but unfortunately I will be out of the country. I wish you all the best!!




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-20


We’ll definitely miss you too, but we understand. 🙏 Thank you for your best wishes!




Rachel 2024-05-21


Congratulations! Looking forward to celebrating together and meeting the family




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-21


Thank you! 💖 We can’t wait for our families to meet.




Kal 2024-05-21


I love you dearly and am so happy you both found each other




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-21


Your love and support mean the world to us. 🎁 and we’re so grateful for all the gifts you’ve given us. 🧶




Dennis 2024-05-22


Congratulations!
The belonging you seek is not behind you, it is ahead — together. I know the Force [Love]. It moves through and surrounds every living thing. Close your eyes, feel it. The light. It’s always been there. It will guide you, for luminous beings you are, not this crude matter. And despite everything, it’s still you — together.
Best wishes to you both! Cheers to a lifetime together 😊
P.S. I hope you enjoyed the references 😉




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-22


💫🌟👩🏽‍🤝‍👨🏻✨🪐 Dennis, your message was truly beautiful. We loved the references that you included.




🌝 2024-05-22


Congratulations ❤️ Wishing you both a lifetime of love and happiness together.




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-22


Thank you for your heartfelt congratulations and kind words. 👩🏽‍❤️‍👨🏻 We’re excited for a lifetime of love and happiness together.




Monica 2024-05-23


Wishing you both a blessed and happy marriage ❤️




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-23


Thank you for your blessings and well wishes as we start this new chapter together. 🌟 You will be missed at the wedding.




Margaret 2024-05-24


Wishing you both all the best with your upcoming wedding.




Sorina and Thomas 2024-05-24


Thank you for your kind words , ❤️ we appreciate all the love and support you have always shown us. We’re sorry to be missing you on the day of, but your love will be with us.
